Docs.typeparam: The final result of the long-running operation.
Docs.summary: Represents a long-running operation that returns a value when it completes.

Docs.summary: The last HTTP response received from the server.
Docs.remarks: The last response returned from the server during the lifecycle of this instance. An instance of sends requests to a server in UpdateStatusAsync, UpdateStatus, and other methods. Responses from these requests can be accessed using GetRawResponse.

Docs.summary: Final result of the long-running operation.
Docs.remarks: This property can be accessed only after the operation completes successfully (HasValue is true).

Docs.summary: Periodically calls the server till the long-running operation completes.
Docs.returns: The last HTTP response received from the server.
